description: Adds a Secure Shell (SSH) public key to a Transfer Family user identified by a UserName value assigned to the specific file transfer protocol-enabled server, identified by ServerId. The response returns the UserName value, the ServerId value, and the name of the SshPublicKeyId.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: A system-assigned unique identifier for a server.

parameters.name: SshPublicKeyBody
parameters.description: The public key portion of an SSH key pair. Transfer Family accepts RSA, ECDSA, and ED25519 keys.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The name of the Transfer Family user that is assigned to one or more servers.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: A system-assigned unique identifier for a server.

nested_items.name: SshPublicKeyId
nested_items.description: The name given to a public key by the system that was imported.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: A user name assigned to the ServerID value that you specified.
